text: 25.21: Mt 24.45-47; Ru 12.44; 16.10; 2 T 2.12; Hi 12.2; 1 Pi 1.8Ana nzuaim, anan guma bakɨme khaŋ ana nzuai, ‘Ndu ŋaara guman vhuuŋ ma, ndu ŋaara vhuuŋra muuŋgi. Ndu tuituigira won ŋaara garav ana muuŋgi. Ndu bigi bisarire, ndu tuituigira nta gari. Maaŋ muuŋgiap, gu ndu vuzvugi, ndu ntigem na bigi vhɨrve ganɨnga. Ndu zɨv na phorgɨv ŋka ndikndigɨrga.’
